changeSet.author: Yash

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN ( select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ( 'Stella Chabata', 'Edward Manyawu', 'Shupikai Raini', 'Wendy Bepe', 'Cosmas Mbire', 'Gabisile Mahora', 'Judith Mkuli', 'Mbekezeli Dube', 'Thomas Madziro', 'Sibusiso Macheso', 'Sibonginkosi Moyo', 'Nobukhosi Dube', 'Philmon Mguni', 'Zanele Ndlovu', 'Desire Muzamhindo' ) and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED" ) AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "Provider name for Enhanced adherence counseling");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to "Provider name for Enhanced adherence counseling"
